name: Turn Dice And Kill
description:
First ever game and many more to come.The idea came to me from the theme of GMKT GameJam 2022 ROLL OF THE DICE.Be sure to check out the game and give your feedbacks as it will help me improve. 

GAME INFORMATION:

This is a turn based game, with the aim of defeating the enemy in this case a zombie(arghhh) . You have to kill the zombie to win. When its the player's turn ,you either heal yourself regaining some HP , or attack the enemy dealing him damage, or ROLL THE DICE- which will give you a weapon based on the number rolled.

Every weapon has a damage and durability associated with it. As the number of the die increases the damage of the weapon involved increases and durability decreases.
